titlestmt.titleproper: Italians of New London Oral History Collection
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Archives & Special Collections Staff.

address.addressline: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center

creation.date: Text converted and initial EAD encoding provided by Apex CoVantage, April 2005

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.repository: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.
did.unittitle: Italians of New London Oral History Collection.
did.abstract: The Italians of New London Oral History Project was conducted by Jerome Fischer, director of the Jewish Federation of Eastern Connecticut, based in New London.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The Italians of New London Oral History Project was conducted by Jerome Fischer, director of the Jewish Federation of Eastern Connecticut, based in New London, CT.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains video tape recordings of individuals of Italian descent living in the New London, Connecticut, area.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of oral histories and materials pertaining to ethnic groups in Connecticut. Specific collections include: the Center for Oral History Interviews, Peoples of Connecticut Project, Estonian, Latvian, Lithuanian Alliance of Connecticut Records, Bisaillon Collection Of French Canadians in Connecticut Collection and the WPA Survey Records. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This record series is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

controlaccess.head: Occupations:
controlaccess.occupation: Director of the Jewish Federation of Eastern Connecticut.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], Italians Of New London Oral History Project Collection. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The videocassettes were donated by Mr. Fischer in 2001.
